definition: and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge

sentences.english: Commander in Chief confidence Man Manbing said that Durante will return the young vanguard position.
sentences.chinese: 主帥信心滿滿並稱杜蘭特將回歸小前鋒位置。

sentences.english: Unionist immediately rejected the idea, calling it a betrayal.
sentences.chinese: 統一黨馬上拒絕了此方案，並稱其爲背叛。

sentences.english: 'Yaojia' was a famous combined call in middle and night Tang dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 姚賈是唐詩史中著名的並稱之一。

sentences.english: She has denied the charges as political purges.
sentences.chinese: 季莫申科否認所有指控並稱這是政治迫害。

definition: called/to call sth (by a name)/to name
to view as/to see as/to consider to be/to deem
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
for this reason/with regards to this/in this respect/in order to do this/to this end
category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on
